      • Ownable

        public Ownable(int fieldID,
               java.lang.String fieldName,
               java.lang.String fieldInfo,
               int price)
        Constructor for any of the ownable fields in the game.
        Parameters:
        fieldID - is the ID of the field.
        fieldName - is the name of the field.
        fieldInfo - is the text shown on the field.
        price - is the price of the field.

      • getRent

        public abstract int getRent()
        abstract method for getting the rent of a field. This is abstract due to the fact that there will be multiple methods for deciding the rent of certain fields.
        Returns:
        is the rent.

      • isPawned

        public boolean isPawned()
        The method of landing on a field. This will be different depending on the field, but they will all perform the check to see if the field is owned by someone or not.
        Returns:
        is the pawn-status of the field.

      • setPawned

        public void setPawned(boolean isPawned)
        used to set a field's pawned-status.
        Parameters:
        isPawned - is the status.

      • landOnField

        public void landOnField(Player player)
        landOnField method for the ownable fields.
        Specified by:
        landOnField in class Field
        Parameters:
        player - is the player landing on the field.
